TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Shape

summary.span: 表示对象在绘图层中，如自选图形、 任意多边形、 OLE 对象、 ActiveX 控件或图片。

span.span: Represents an object in the drawing layer, such as an AutoShape, freeform, OLE object, ActiveX control, or picture.

para.span: 该 对象是集合的成员 ，其中包括文档的主要部分或文档的所有页眉和页脚中的所有形状。

span.span: The object is a member of the collection, which includes all the shapes in the main story of a document or in all the headers and footers of a document.

para.span: 形状总是附加到某个锚定范围。

span.span: A shape is always attached to an anchoring range.

para.span: 您可以将形状放置在包含锁定标记的页面上的任何位置。

span.span: You can position the shape anywhere on the page that contains the anchor.

para.span: 有三个代表形状的对象：该 集合代表文档中的所有形状; 该集合代表文档中的 形状的指定子集（例如， 对象可以代表文档中的形状一和四个，也可以代表文档中的所有选定形状）; 代表文档中的单个形状的对象。

span.span: There are three objects that represent shapes: the collection, which represents all the shapes on a document; the collection, which represents a specified subset of the shapes on a document (for example, a object could represent shapes one and four on the document, or it could represent all the selected shapes on the document); the object, which represents a single shape on a document.

para.span: 如果要同时处理多个形状或选定内容中的形状，请使用 集合。

span.span: If you want to work with several shapes at the same time or with shapes within the selection, use a collection.

para.span: 使用Shapes（ ），其中 是名称或索引号，返回单个 对象。

span.span: Use Shapes(), where is the name or the index number, to return a single object.

para.span: 每个形状创建时分配一个默认名称。

span.span: Each shape is assigned a default name when it is created.

para.span: 例如，如果向文档中添加了三个不同的形状，它们可能会被命名为"矩形 2、"文本框 3"和"椭圆 4。

span.span: For example, if you add three different shapes to a document, they might be named "Rectangle 2," "TextBox 3," and "Oval 4."

para.span: 若要为形状指定更有意义的名称，请设置 属性。

span.span: To give a shape a more meaningful name, set the property.

para.span: 使用所选内容。 ShapeRange（ ），其中 是名称或索引号，用于返回一个 代表所选内容中的形状的对象。

span.span: Use Selection.ShapeRange(), where is the name or the index number, to return a object that represents a shape within a selection.

para.span: 若要将 对象添加到指定文档的形状集合中，并返回 表示新创建的形状的对象，请使用集合的下列方法之一 ： 、 、、 、、、、、、、或。

span.span: To add a object to the collection of shapes for the specified document and return a object that represents the newly created shape, use one of the following methods of the collection: , , , , , , , , , , or .

para.span: 使用GroupItems（ ）（其中 是形状名称或组中的索引号）可返回一个shape对象，该对象表示组合形状中的单个形状。

span.span: Use GroupItems(), where is the shape name or the index number within the group, to return a Shape object that represents a single shape in a grouped shape.

para.span: 使用 or 方法可对一系列形状进行分组，并返回 代表新形成的组的单个对象。

span.span: Use the or method to group a range of shapes and return a single object that represents the newly formed group.

para.span: 一组形成之后，处理组相同的方式使用任何其他形状。

span.span: After a group has been formed, you can work with the group the same way you work with any other shape.

para.span: 每个 对象都锚定到一个文本区域。

span.span: Every object is anchored to a range of text.

para.span: 将某个形状锁定到包含锁定范围的第一段的开头。

span.span: A shape is anchored to the beginning of the first paragraph that contains the anchoring range.

para.span: 该形状总是与其锁定标记在同一页上。

span.span: The shape will always remain on the same page as its anchor.

para.span: 您可以通过将 属性设置为True来查看锚点本身。

span.span: You can view the anchor itself by setting the property to True.

para.span: 形状的 和 属性确定其垂直和水平位置。

span.span: The shape's and properties determine its vertical and horizontal positions.

para.span: 形状 和 属性决定了位置是从锚定段落、包含锚定段落的列、边距还是页面的边缘进行度量。

span.span: The shape's and properties determine whether the position is measured from the anchoring paragraph, the column that contains the anchoring paragraph, the margin, or the edge of the page.

para.span: 如果 形状的属性设置为True，则不能将定位标记从其在页面上的位置拖放。

span.span: If the property for the shape is set to True, you cannot drag the anchor from its position on the page.

para.span: 使用 属性返回 对象，该对象包含用于设置闭合形状的填充格式的所有属性和方法。

span.span: Use the property to return the object, which contains all the properties and methods for formatting the fill of a closed shape.

para.span: 该 属性返回 用于设置阴影格式的对象。

span.span: The property returns the object, which you use to format a shadow.

para.span: 使用 属性返回 对象，该对象包含用于设置线条和箭头格式的属性和方法。

span.span: Use the property to return the object, which contains properties and methods for formatting lines and arrows.

para.span: 该 属性返回 用于设置艺术字格式的对象。

span.span: The property returns the object, which you use to format WordArt.

para.span: 属性返回 对象，该对象用于设置线形标注的格式。

span.span: The property returns the object, which you use to format line callouts.

para.span: 属性返回 对象，该对象用于定义文字环绕形状的方式。

span.span: The property returns the object, which you use to define how text wraps around shapes.

para.span: 该 属性返回 用于创建三维形状的对象。

span.span: The property returns the object, which you use to create 3-D shapes.

para.span: 您可以使用 和 方法将格式从一个形状转移到另一个形状。

span.span: You can use the and methods to transfer formatting from one shape to another.

para.span: 使用 对象的方法 设置文档的默认形状的格式。

span.span: Use the method for a object to set the formatting for the default shape for the document.

para.span: 新形状将继承默认形状的许多属性。

span.span: New shapes inherit many of their attributes from the default shape.

para.span: 使用 属性可指定形状的类型：任意多边形、自选图形、OLE 对象、标注或链接图片，例如。

span.span: Use the property to specify the type of shape: freeform, AutoShape, OLE object, callout, or linked picture, for instance.

para.span: 使用 属性可指定自选图形的类型：椭圆形、矩形或球标，例如。

span.span: Use the property to specify the type of AutoShape: oval, rectangle, or balloon, for instance.

para.span: 使用 和 属性可指定形状的大小。

span.span: Use the and properties to specify the size of the shape.

para.span: 属性返回 对象，该对象包含用于将文本附加到形状以及在文本框架之间链接文本的所有属性和方法。

span.span: The property returns the object, which contains all the properties and methods for attaching text to shapes and linking the text between text frames.

para.span: 对象定位到文本区域，但它们是自由浮动的，可以放置在页面上的任何位置。

span.span: objects are anchored to a range of text but are free-floating and can be positioned anywhere on the page.

para.span: 对象被视为字符，并作为字符置于文本行中。

span.span: objects are treated like characters and are positioned as characters within a line of text.

para.span: 您可以使用 方法和 方法将形状从一种类型转换为另一种类型。

span.span: You can use the method and the method to convert shapes from one type to the other.

para.span: 您可以将图片、 OLE 对象和 ActiveX 控件转换为嵌入式图形。

span.span: You can convert only pictures, OLE objects, and ActiveX controls to inline shapes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Activate() runtime managed

summary.span: 激活指定的对象。

span.span: Activates the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Adjustments As Adjustments

summary.span: 返回一个 对象，该对象包含指定 对象中代表自选图形或艺术字的所有调整的调整值。

span.span: Returns a object that contains adjustment values for all the adjustments in the specified object that represents an AutoShape or WordArt.

member this.AlternativeText : string with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置与 Web 页中的形状相关联的可选文字。

span.span: Returns or sets the alternative text associated with a shape in a Web page.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Anchor As Range
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Range ^ Anchor { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Range ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 对象，表示指定形状的锁定范围。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the anchoring range for the specified shape.

value.span: 所有 对象都定位到某一文本区域，但可将其放置在包含锁定标记的页面上的任何位置。

span.span: All objects are anchored to a range of text but can be positioned anywhere on the page that contains the anchor.

value.span: 如果在创建形状时，您指定了锁定范围，锚点位于包含锁定范围的第一个段落的开头。

span.span: If you specify the anchoring range when you create a shape, the anchor is positioned at the beginning of the first paragraph that contains the anchoring range.

value.span: 如果不指定锁定区域，则自动选定锁定区域，形状相对于页面的上边缘和左边缘定位。形状将始终保持与其锁定标记位于同一页上。

span.span: If you don't specify the anchoring range, the anchoring range is selected automatically and the shape is positioned relative to the top and left edges of the page.The shape will always remain on the same page as its anchor.

value.span: 如果 形状的属性设置为True，则不能将定位标记从其在页面上的位置拖放。

span.span: If the property for the shape is set to True, you cannot drag the anchor from its position on the page.

public: property int AnchorID { int get(); };

para.span: 如果 以前未使用方法复制对象的格式 ，则使用 方法将生成错误。

span.span: If formatting for the object has not previously been copied using the method, using the method generates an error.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoAutoShapeType AutoShapeType { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoAutoShapeType get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoAutoShapeType value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定对象的形状类型，该类型 必须代表除直线或任意多边形绘图之外的自选图形。

span.span: Returns or sets the shape type for the specified object, which must represent an AutoShape other than a line or freeform drawing.

para.span: 改变一个形状的类型时，该形状保留其大小、颜色和其他属性。

span.span: When you change the type of a shape, the shape retains its size, color, and other attributes.

The background style of the specified shape.

para.span: 读/写 。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CanvasCropBottom([in]float32 Increment) runtime managed

param.name: Increment
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 裁剪后所需保留的绘图画布高度的百分比数值。

span.span: The amount in percentage points of a drawing canvas's height that you want remaining after the canvas is cropped.

param.span: 输入 0.9 作为增量从底部裁剪绘图画布高度的百分之十。

span.span: Entering 0.9 as the increment crops ten percent of the canvas's height from the bottom.

param.span: 输入 0.1 从底部裁剪绘图画布高度的百分之九十。

span.span: Entering 0.1 crops ninety percent of the canvas's height from the bottom.

summary.span: 从绘图画布的底部裁剪一定百分比的绘图画布高度。

span.span: Crops a percentage of the height of a drawing canvas from the bottom of the canvas.

para.span: 使用 方法从顶部进行裁剪。

span.span: Use the method to crop from the top.

param.span: 输入 0.1 从左侧裁剪绘图画布宽度的百分之九十。

span.span: Entering 0.1 crops ninety percent of the canvas's width from the left.

span.span: Use the method to crop from the right side of a drawing canvas.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Frame ConvertToFrame() runtime managed

summary.span: 将指定的图形转换为图文框。

span.span: Converts the specified shape to a frame.

para.span: 此属性返回一个 对象，该对象代表新的图文框。

span.span: This property returns a object that represents the new frame.

para.span: 不支持附加文本的图形不能转换为图文框。

span.span: Shapes that don't support attached text cannot be converted to frames.

para.span: 对于图片、OLE 对象和 ActiveX 控件，请使用 方法。

span.span: For pictures, OLE objects, and ActiveX controls, use the method.

para.span: 在 Microsoft Word 97 及更高版本中，框架已替换为文本框。

span.span: In Microsoft Word 97 and later, frames have been replaced by text boxes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape ConvertToInlineShape() runtime managed

summary.span: 将文档绘图层的指定图形转换为文字层的嵌入式图形。

span.span: Converts the specified shape in the drawing layer of a document to an inline shape in the text layer.

para.span: 只能转换代表图片、OLE 对象或 ActiveX 控件的图形。

span.span: You can convert only shapes that represent pictures, OLE objects, or ActiveX controls.

para.span: 此方法返回一个 对象，该对象代表图片或 OLE 对象。

span.span: This method returns an object that represents the picture or OLE object.

para.span: 支持附加的文字的图形不能转换为嵌入式图形。

span.span: Shapes that support attached text cannot be converted to inline shapes.

para.span: 对于这些形状，请使用 方法。

span.span: For these shapes, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

para.span: 如果指定的对象是在 Microsoft Word 中创建的，则此属性返回十六进制数字是4d535744，表示字符串 "MSWD"。

span.span: If the specified object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."

para.span: [!注释] 此值还可以通过常量 wdCreatorCode 表示。

span.span: This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

para.span: Creator属性主要用于在 Macintosh 上使用，其中每个应用程序都有一个四字符创建者代码。

span.span: The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Word 提供了 MSWD 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD.

para.span: 有关此属性的其他信息，请参阅语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本所附带的帮助。

span.span: For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasChart As MsoTriState
public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState HasChart { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState get(); };

summary.span: 如此 如果指定的形状包含的图表。

span.span: For OLE charts, use InlineShape.OLEFormat.ProgID and check for the following possible values: "Excel.Chart.8", "MSGraph.Chart.8", "Excel.Sheet.8", "Excel.Chart.5", "MSGraph.Chart.5", or "Excel.Sheet.5".

summary.span: 返回一个Integer类型的值，该值代表表格中的形状是显示在表格内还是表格外部。

span.span: Returns an Integer that represents whether a shape in a table is displayed inside the table or outside of the table.

para.span: 此属性返回True以指示指定的图片显示在表格中，设置为False可指示指定的图片显示在表格外部。

span.span: This property returns True to indicate that a specified picture is displayed within the table, and False to indicate that a specified picture is displayed outside of the table.

para.span: 仅当LayoutInCell 对象的属性 设置为wdWrapTypeInline或wdWrapTypeNone以外的其他内容时，设置 LayoutInCell 属性才会生效。

span.span: Setting the LayoutInCell property will take effect only if the property of the object is set to something other than wdWrapTypeInline or wdWrapTypeNone.

para.span: LayoutInCell 属性对应于格式图片的 高级版式对话框中的 表格单元格中的版式选项。

span.span: The LayoutInCell property corresponds to the Layout in table cell option in the Advanced Layout dialog box for picture formatting.

para.span: 形状的位置被指从形状边界框的左上角到图形的锁定标记。

span.span: The position of a shape is measured from the upper-left corner of the shape's bounding box to the shape's anchor.

para.span: 该 属性控制锚点是否位于页面的字符、列、边距或边缘的旁边。

span.span: The property controls whether the anchor is positioned alongside a character, column, margin, or the edge of the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int LockAnchor { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.LockAnchor : int with get, set

summary.span: 确定指定的 对象的定位标记是否锁定到锁定区域。

span.span: Determines if the specified object's anchor is locked to the anchoring range.

para.span: 如果指定 对象的定位标记被锁定到锁定区域，则该属性返回 true。

span.span: This property returns true if the specified object's anchor is locked to the anchoring range.

para.span: 如果形状具有锁定的定位标记，则不能通过拖动来移动形状的锚点（当形状移动时，锁定标记不移动）。

span.span: When a shape has a locked anchor, you cannot move the shape's anchor by dragging it (the anchor doesn't move as the shape is moved).

para.span: 虽然 Shape 对象已锁定到某一文字范围，但是您可以将该对象放在页面上的任何位置。

span.span: A Shape object is anchored to a range of text, but you can position it anywhere on the page.

para.span: 形状锁定到包含锁定范围的第一段的开始。

span.span: The shape is anchored to the beginning of the first paragraph that contains the anchoring range.

para.span: 形状总是与其锁定标记位于同一页。

span.span: A shape will always remain on the same page as its anchor.

summary.span: 确定在调整大小或保持其原始比例时，是否可以独立地更改形状的高度和宽度。

span.span: Determines if you can change the height and width of the shape independently of one another when you resize it or if it retains its original proportions.

para.span: 如果指定的形状在调整尺寸时保持其原始比例，则此属性返回MsoTrue ; 如果您可以在调整其尺寸时，单独更改形状的高度和宽度，则返回MsoFalse 。

span.span: This property returns MsoTrue if the specified shape retains its original proportions when you resize it, and MsoFalse if you can change the height and width of the shape independently of one another when you resize it.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ScaleHeight (float Factor, Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoTriState RelativeToOriginalSize, Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoScaleFrom Scale = Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoScaleFrom.msoScaleFromTopLeft);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ScaleHeight([in]float32 Factor, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoTriState RelativeToOriginalSize, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoScaleFrom Scale) runtime managed
Public Sub ScaleHeight (Factor As Single, RelativeToOriginalSize As MsoTriState, Optional Scale As MsoScaleFrom = Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoScaleFrom.msoScaleFromTopLeft)
abstract member ScaleHeight : single * Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoTriState * Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoScaleFrom -> unit

param.name: Factor
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 指定形状调整后的高度与当前或原始高度的比例。

span.span: Specifies the ratio between the height of the shape after you resize it and the current or original height.

param.span: 例如，要将一个矩形放大百分之五十，请将此参数指定为 1.5。

span.span: For example, to make a rectangle 50 percent larger, specify 1.5 for this argument.

param.name: RelativeToOriginalSize
param.span: 必需 。

span.span: Required .

param.span: 为 扩展相对于原始大小的形状。

span.span: True to scale the shape relative to its original size.

param.span: False ，则相对于当前大小缩放形状。

span.span: False to scale it relative to its current size.

param.span: 仅当指定的形状是图片或 OLE 对象时，可以将此参数指定 为 True 。

span.span: You can specify True for this argument only if the specified shape is a picture or an OLE object.

param.name: Scale
param.span: 可选 。

span.span: Optional .

param.span: 在缩放形状时，形状中位置不变的部分。

span.span: The part of the shape that retains its position when the shape is scaled.

summary.span: 按指定因子缩放形状的高度。

span.span: Scales the height of the shape by a specified factor.

para.span: 对于图片和 OLE 对象，您可以说明是相对于原始大小还是相对于当前大小缩放形状。对于图片和 OLE 对象以外的形状总是相对于当前高度缩放。

span.span: For pictures and OLE objects, you can indicate whether you want to scale the shape relative to the original size or relative to the current size. Shapes other than pictures and OLE objects are always scaled relative to their current height.

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象提供一种处理与指定形状相关联的 SmartArt 的方式。

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串包含指定形状的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that contains a title for the specified shape.

value.span: 一个包含指定形状的标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains a title for the specified shape.

para.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 使用此属性可为形状提供可选文字标题。

span.span: Use this property to provide an alternative text title for a shape.

para.span: 此属性将标题文本添加到 Microsoft Word 2010 的 "设置形状格式" 对话框的 "替换文本" 窗格上的 "标题" 文本框中。

span.span: This property adds title text to the Title text box on the Alt Text pane of the Format Shape dialog in Microsoft Word 2010.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float Top { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.Top : single with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置指定形状的垂直位置（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Returns or sets the vertical position of the specified shape in points.

para.span: 形状的位置被指从形状边界框的左上角到图形的锁定标记。

span.span: The position of a shape is measured from the upper-left corner of the shape's bounding box to the shape's anchor.

para.span: 该 属性控制形状的定位标记的放置在页面上的行、段落、边距或边缘的旁边。

span.span: The property controls whether the shape's anchor is positioned alongside the line, the paragraph, the margin, or the edge of the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float TopRelative { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.TopRelative : single with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置 一个 值，代表形状顶部的相对位置。

span.span: Returns or sets a Single that represents the relative top position of a shape.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 将此属性与属性一起使用 。

span.span: Use this property with the property.

para.span: 当设置为wdShapePositionRelativeNone （-999999）（请参阅 枚举）时，应忽略此属性，因为形状不使用百分比定位。

span.span: When set to wdShapePositionRelativeNone (-999999) (see the enumeration), this property should be ignored because the shape does not use percent positioning.

para.span: 垂直位置是由属性单独确定的 。

span.span: The vertical position is solely determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Type As MsoShapeType

summary.span: 返回图形的类型。

span.span: Returns the shape type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ShapeRange Ungroup() runtime managed

summary.span: 取消组合指定形状中的所有组合形状。

span.span: Ungroups any grouped shapes in the specified shape.

para.span: 分解指定形状中的图片和 OLE 对象。

span.span: Disassembles pictures and OLE objects within the specified shape.

para.span: 以单个对象的形式返回取消组合的形状 。

span.span: Returns the ungrouped shapes as a single object.

para.span: 由于将一组形状作为单个对象处理，对形状进行组合和取消组合将会更改集合中的项目数 ，并更改集合中受影响的项目之后的项目的索引号。

span.span: Because a group of shapes is treated as a single object, grouping and ungrouping shapes changes the number of items in the collection and changes the index numbers of items that come after the affected items in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VerticalFlip As MsoTriState
public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState VerticalFlip { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState get(); };

summary.span: 确定指定的形状是否绕垂直轴翻转。

span.span: Determines if the specified shape is flipped around the vertical axis.

para.span: 如果指定的形状绕垂直轴翻转，则此属性返回True ，否则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if the specified shape is flipped around the vertical axis, and False if not.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Vertices As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Vertices { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 将指定任意多边形形状的顶点（及贝塞尔曲线的控制点）坐标作为一系列坐标对返回。

span.span: Returns the coordinates of the specified freeform drawing's vertices (and control points for Bézier curves) as a series of coordinate pairs.

para.span: 可以使用该属性返回的数组作为 or 方法的参数 。

span.span: You can use the array returned by this property as an argument for the or method.

para.span: 下表显示顶点属性如何将数组 vertArray （）中的值与三角形的顶点的坐标相关联。

span.span: The following table shows how the Vertices property associates values in the array vertArray() with the coordinates of a triangle's vertices.
vertArray(1, 1)

description.span: 第一个顶点至文档的左边界的水平距离。

span.span: The horizontal distance from the first vertex to the left side of the document.
vertArray(1, 2)

description.span: 第一个顶点至文档顶端的垂直距离。

span.span: The vertical distance from the first vertex to the top of the document.
vertArray(2, 1)

description.span: 第二个顶点至文档的左边界的水平距离。

span.span: The horizontal distance from the second vertex to the left side of the document.
vertArray(2, 2)

description.span: 第二个顶点至文档顶端的垂直距离。

span.span: The vertical distance from the second vertex to the top of the document.
vertArray(3, 1)

description.span: 第三个顶点至文档的左边界的水平距离。

span.span: The horizontal distance from the third vertex to the left side of the document.
vertArray(3, 2)

description.span: 第三个顶点至文档顶端的垂直距离。

span.span: The vertical distance from the third vertex to the top of the document.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState Visible { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState value); };
member this.Visible : Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoTriState with get, set

summary.span: 确定指定的对象或应用于它的格式是否可见。

span.span: Determines if the specified object, or the formatting applied to it, is visible.

para.span: 如果指定的对象或应用于它的格式是可见的，则此属性返回True ; 如果不是，则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if the specified object, or the formatting applied to it, is visible, and False if it is not.

para.span: 对于任何对象，某些方法和属性可能不可用，如果 可见性 属性为 False 。

span.span: For any object, some methods and properties may be unavailable if the Visible property is False.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.
Returns .

para.span: 将此属性与属性一起使用 。

span.span: Use this property with the property.

para.span: 当设置为wdShapeSizeRelativeNone （-999999）（请参阅 枚举）时，应忽略此属性，因为形状不使用百分比调整大小。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ZOrder([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoZOrderCmd ZOrderCmd) runtime managed

param.name: ZOrderCmd
param.span: 必需 。

span.span: Required .

param.span: 指定相对于其他形状将指定形状移动到的位置。

span.span: Specifies where to move the specified shape relative to the other shapes.

summary.span: 将指定形状移动到集合中的其他形状的前面或后面（即更改 z 顺序中的形状位置）。

span.span: Moves the specified shape in front of or behind other shapes in the collection (that is, changes the shape's position in the z-order).

para.span: 使用 属性可确定形状在 z-顺序中的当前位置。

span.span: Use the property to determine a shape's current position in the z-order.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ZOrderPosition As Integer
public: property int ZOrderPosition { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回指定的形状在 z 顺序中的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of the specified shape in the z-order.

para.span: 若要设置形状在 z-顺序中的位置，请使用 方法。

span.span: To set the shape's position in the z-order, use the method.

para.span: 形状在 z-顺序中的位置与形状在集合中的索引号相对应 。

span.span: A shape's position in the z-order corresponds to the shape's index number in the collection.

para.span: 无论何时将新形状添加到集合中，默认情况下该形状都将添加到 z 顺序的最前端。

span.span: Whenever you add a new shape to a collection, it's added to the front of the z-order by default.
